Game: Chuck E. Cheese's Party Games 2010-08-02T00:00:00-07:00 WHERE A KID CAN BE A KID! Rock out on stage with Chuck, race trucks with Jasper, make pizzas with Pasqually and more! Play your favorite arcade games, earn tickets and collect prizes to deck out your own special room.
